entities.name: luna lovegood

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story and is reading The Quibbler magazine.

entities.name: kingsley
entities.description: Kingsley handed Mr. Weasley something which was later found to be The Quibbler magazine.

entities.name: sirius black
entities.description: Sirius Black is the main character of the article in The Quibbler and is accused of mass murder.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley received something from Kingsley which was later found to be The Quibbler magazine.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Azkaban is a prison where Sirius Black escaped two years ago.

relationships.description: Harry read about Sirius Black in The Quibbler magazine.
